articles.content: THE day started unexpectedly early at 4.30am, when I was told I would have to have my hair and make-up done by NBC. Although Harry and Meghans wedding wasnt due to start until noon, the American TV and news network had a cast of thousands that they needed to … [+1774 chars]

articles.title: Lynn Shelton dead: GLOW director died aged 54 due to blood disorder - Mirror Online
articles.description: Lynn leaves behind a young son and her devastated partner Marc Maron shared a heartbreaking statement about her death after being diagnosed with a blood disorder
articles.content:
American actress and director Lynn Shelton has died after fighting a blood disorder.
The film and TV maker worked on projects including the Netflix smash GLOW, award winning drama Mad Men and the Reese Witherspoon rooted drama Little Fires Everywhere.
Lynn … [+2614 chars]

articles.title: Carol Vorderman puts her curves on display in tight ensemble on arrival at studio - Mirror Online
articles.description: Carol Vorderman looked radiant as she arrived for her BBC Radio Wales show in a skintight designer ensemble that showed off her figure
articles.content:
Carol Vorderman looked stunning as she arrived at BBC Radio Wales on Saturday. 
The 59-year-old beamed for the cameras as she arrived at work looking radiant and youthful.

articles.title: Hackers who stole data from entertainment law firm threaten to release Trump’s ‘dirty laundry’ - The Independent
articles.description: Criminal group demands £35m in ransom over supposedly damaging stolen documents
articles.content:
Hackers who have stolen data from a major entertainment law firm have threatened to release Donald Trumps dirty laundry unless they receive $42m (£35m) in ransom.
The criminal group hacked the law firm Grubman Shire Meiselas & Sacks last week and release… [+9633 chars]
